code: import axiosService from'../utils/AxiosService';import{API_ENDPOINT}from'../utils/Constaints';export const saveAndEditUser=request=>{const url=API_ENDPOINT+'api/users/register';let formData=new FormData();formData.append('user',JSON.stringify(request.user));if(request.image!=undefined||request.image!=null){formData.append('image',request.image);}return axiosService.post(url,formData);};
